title: The efficacy of Pb, As(V) and Sb(III) removal by biochar is determined by solution chemistry
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3EW00726J, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Sampriti Chaudhuri, Gabriel Sigmund, Naresh Kumar, Thorsten Hüffer, Andreas Mautner, Thilo Hofmann
A design of experiments approach was used to elucidate the combined effects of dissolved ions and particulate phases on the efficacy of biochar in metal and metalloid removal.
